 2012-17452012-12-13TBS,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActPublic Sector Pension Investment Board Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Public Sector Pension Investment Board Regulations
PrecisProposed REGULATIONS AMENDING THE PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD REGULATIONS in order to expand the definition of "Related Party" to include those individuals entitled to benefits under the Reserve Force Pension Plan Regulations. This proposed housekeeping amendment seeks to ensure that the definition of "Related Party" captures all relevant individuals.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2012-0295 Publication Date: 2013-01-02
AttachmentsAttachment
